title: How to Get the Ghoul Mask & What It Does in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Have 50 Ectoplasm.
steps.content: Have 50 Ectoplasm. The only requirement is you have the necessary Ectoplasm to purchase the mask.

steps.title: Go to the Cursed Ship.
steps.content: Go to the Cursed Ship. It's in the Second Sea.

steps.title: Talk to El Perro and purchase the mask.
steps.content: Talk to El Perro and purchase the mask. He's next to the Ship Deckhand NPC on the right side of the ship. [1] X Research source When you purchase the mask for 50 Ectoplasm, don't forget to equip it. Accessories are wearable so you can get their benefits. Open your inventory (`), select the mask, and click Equip . When it's equipped, you'll see a small "E" in the mask's thumbnail in your inventory. You can only have one accessory equipped at a time.

steps.title: 10% life leech on Melee attacks against players and 2.5% life leech against NPCs.
steps.content: 10% life leech on Melee attacks against players and 2.5% life leech against NPCs. This life leech stacks with the Ghoul race and works with players who favor the Buddha Fruit.

steps.title: +35% movement speed.
steps.content: +35% movement speed. This is the highest movement speed buff you can get from the Second Sea.

steps.title: +500 Energy.
steps.content: +500 Energy. This means that you can do more Air Jumps, Flash Steps, or other moves before your Energy empties. [2] X Research source
